channel.title: Im trying to change it where the playes only need jre6 and..... REP ++
channel.description:
Players have been getting frustrated because they need JRE 7 to play, which is the most updated java version.
So I thought "maybe I could just compile it with jdk 1.6 and be done with it!"
but im getting an error. It doesnt look big but here it is: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. [/code]
When I compile it I get:
[code] warning: .\sign\signlink.class: major version 51 is newer than 50, the highest m ajor version supported by this compiler. It is recommended that the compiler be upgraded. Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 warning Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I looked through the signlink but couldnt find anything that I understood. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Im trying to change it where the playes only need jre6 and..... REP ++
item.dc:creator: @marcus_nunez marcus nunez
item.description:
@marcus_nunez wrote:

No problem, and yea that would be your best bet is just telling them to download the newest version of java.

Read full topic

@marcus_nunez wrote:

Try deleting jre7 from your cp. And make sure that jre6 is in the right location it is trying to get in. I am currently running jre6, or just find a older source of the same kind and find one that ran on jre6 and get the code from that one and post it in your newer source.

item.title: Im trying to change it where the playes only need jre6 and..... REP ++
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Alright, what about running it though?

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Gui.  Program will exit.

I’m wanting to be able to run the client with JRE 6 not 7, but thats what happens when you try to run it with JRE 6.

Read full topic

item.source: Im trying to change it where the playes only need jre6 and..... REP ++

item.title: Im trying to change it where the playes only need jre6 and..... REP ++
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:6, topic:418436”]To get it to compile with a class file compatible with jre6, put,

-source 1.6 -target 1.6

between the target for javac, and the files your compiling.[/quote]

You mean put @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
into my compiler? I’ve tried that. That’s why I’m getting the errors I posted up there ^

Read full topic
